question: (Mike & Mike deliver the clue.)  My greatest inspirational moment ever was Lou Gehrig's farewall speech at Yankee Stadium in 1939, talk about classYes, very, very classy, but for pure inspiration, I'll take this coach telling his Notre Dame team to "win one for the Gipper" & then rallying to defeat Army in 1928
